ValidationRule.description: For countries that have states (i.e. State != Country), then State should be not null when Country is not null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name == 'EMAP Application Request', ISBLANK(TEXT( Account_Shipping_State__c )), OR( ISPICKVAL( Account_Shipping_Country__c , "Australia"), ISPICKVAL( Account_Shipping_Country__c , "Malaysia") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Shipping state cannot be empty. Please enter Shipping state.
